english_example_sentence: If the curious children were to touch the old book, it would become dusty.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы любопытные дети прикоснулись к старой книге, она бы запылилась.
turkish_example_sentence: Eğer meraklı çocuklar eski kitaba dokunsalar, toz olur.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Eğer meraklı çocuklar eski kitaba ______, toz olur.
